text:
The Chairperson of the Parliament of Albania () is the head of the Parliament whose term coincides with the term of the Parliament and they are elected by a vote during the opening session.
If the President is temporarily absent or is out of office, the speaker takes over the functions of the office, as specified by the Constitution.
As of 9 September 2017, the Chairperson of the Parliament is Gramoz Ruçi.
